name: Bullet Fire (AllawiDev)
description:
Bullet Fire is a shooter platformer i made in 2 weeks its my second game, and its in early access so bugs will be fixed and more updates coming.

You are a guy who lives in the jungle living normal life till one day enemies has came from another planet and no one knows how they made, you are the only who can find out, take a weapon and start killing them till you reach the BOSS and find out why they came here

Controls:

ARROWS - MOVEMENT

X - SHOOT

R - RESTART

C - GRENADE

V - RELOAD
